abstract: A Johnson & Johnson unit announced a nationwide recall of more than 13 million packages of Rolaids after reports of consumers finding metal and wood particles in the products.
snippet: A Johnson & Johnson unit announced a nationwide recall of more than 13 million packages of Rolaids after reports of consumers finding metal and wood particles in the products.
lead_paragraph: A unit of Johnson & Johnson announced a nationwide recall on Thursday of all lots  more than 13 million packages  of the soft chewable versions of Rolaids, its popular antacid drug, after reports of consumers finding metal and wood particles in the products.

headline.main: J.&J. Unit Issues Recall of Rolaids
headline.print_headline: J.&J. Unit Issues Recall Of Rolaids
